snippet: Andy Murray will be looking to put a stressful two days behind him when he faces Bernard Tomic, the last home hope in the men's draw, in the fourth round of the Australian Open on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray will be looking to put a stressful two days behind him when he faces Bernard Tomic, the last home hope in the men's draw, in the fourth round of the Australian Open on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Returns to Court After Stressful Two Days
headline.main: Murray Returns to Court After Stressful Two Days
